Card Type: Creature
Card Number: 76
Rarity: Epic
Race: Undead
Background: Forest
Flavor Text: Although not evil, necromancers delve into the forbidden arcane arts of summoning the dead back to life. Demons have a strong hatred for these masters of the undead, as they are seen as stealing souls from Hell. 
Armor Level: 3
Speed: 9
Health Points: 80
Attack Name: Bone Spear
Attack Dice: 1
Modifier: 1
Other Attributes: N/A
Affects Boss: No
Extended Effect Description: While this card is on the field you may summon a creature from your cemetery to the field as a limited summon. You may only have 1 limited summoned creature brought to the field by this effect at a time. If the Necromancer is removed from the field the resurrected creature is sent to the cemetery. If the Necromancer's effect is negated send the resurrected creature back to the cemetery. If the card negating the Necromancer's effect is removed from the field, the Necromancer regains his effect and can summon a creature to the field using his effect. Extended Effect Description: Equip this card to a creature on the field. Once equipped the equipped creature has its current Armor Level reduced by 2 once per turn cycle. The Armor Level reduction is applied at the beginning of the player who played this card. Zombified cancels any other Armor Level increasing effects that would apply to the equipped card.
